metadata.description: Get ready as Archie and the gang brave the storm of a tornado full a sharks that riffs off the pop culture phenomenon known as Sharknado! The story unfolds as sharknados are spotted on the "Feast" Coast! Archie and the gang go, go, go as they battle the Sharknado-ravaged Riverdale! Who will live? Who will die? Will this take a BITE out of the end-of-the-year prom? Uh... probably! The comic book action is also concurrent with the plot of SHARKNADO 3, premiering July on Syfy. Written by the SHARKNADO trilogy director Anthony C. Ferrante with Dan Parent.
metadata.name: Archie VS. Sharknado
